lead_paragraph: LOVETT--Laurence Dow. The Board of Directors and staff of the Metropolitan Opera Guild are saddened by the death of our friend and esteemed Board member, Laurence D. Lovett. Larry joined the Guild Board in 1961, and served with distinction as our President and later as our Chairman. His support of the Guild was inspired by his profound, lifelong love of opera and music, and we will miss him. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LOVETT, LAURENCE DOW

His support of the Guild was inspired by his profound, lifelong love of opera and music, and we will miss him. 1/3
